channel.description: Recent content in arts on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Orange Clouds
item.description: This post is like a smell of a level-up of a kind. For some time I wanted to write a post about where this simple writing experiment got me. Surely interest in arts is involved too. What got me to that idea is that everytime I go for a walk I see something new. Something worth recording or trying to analyse in a post. So there is plenty of simple-looking experiences but in limited time non obvious how to approach in a contained way.
